effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
